name: Relume
description: Relume is an AI-powered website builder that accelerates the creation of sitemaps, wireframes, and designs for Webflow and Figma users.
longDescription: Relume is an innovative AI-powered platform designed to streamline the web design and development process for professionals using Webflow and Figma. Originally launched as a Webflow components library in 2021, it has evolved into a comprehensive AI website builder that empowers designers and developers to create marketing websites quickly. By leveraging AI to generate sitemaps, wireframes, and style guides, Relume reduces manual effort and enhances collaboration across teams. Its mission is to empower web designers, not replace them, by providing tools that save time and improve project efficiency. The platform integrates seamlessly with popular design tools, allowing users to export designs to Figma and Webflow effortlessly. Relume serves freelancers, agencies, and teams looking to deliver high-quality websites faster.
features: AI-powered sitemap generation creates detailed website structures from text prompts in seconds, saving time during project planning.
Wireframe creation with AI generates multi-page wireframes with copy in minutes, streamlining the design process.
Relume Library provides over 1,000 human-designed Webflow and Figma components for building scalable websites.
Seamless Figma and Webflow integration allows users to export sitemaps and wireframes directly into these platforms for further refinement.
AI Style Guide Builder generates on-brand design concepts in minutes, ready to export to Figma and Webflow.
Collaboration tools enable real-time teamwork, feedback sharing, and iteration within the platform.
Client-First Webflow Style System ensures organized, scalable website builds with standardized class naming.
Relume Ipsum offers AI-generated website copy directly in Figma, speeding up content creation.
Sitemap Import feature allows users to paste a website URL to generate wireframes quickly for client pitches.
Figma Kit with over 1,000 components, including mobile variants, supports efficient design workflows.
React UI Library provides 1,400+ components built with Typescript, Tailwind, and Shadcn UI for developers.
Relume Design League hosts competitive design challenges, fostering community engagement among web designers.

faqs.question: What is Relume used for?
faqs.answer: Relume is an AI-powered tool that helps designers and developers create sitemaps, wireframes, and website designs quickly, integrating with Webflow and Figma.

faqs.question: Does Relume offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Relume offers a free plan with limited features, including access to 30 Webflow components and one project with unlimited AI usage.

faqs.question: How does Relume integrate with Webflow?
faqs.answer: Relume allows users to copy sitemaps and wireframes from its Site Builder and paste them directly into Webflow, automatically applying Client-First class naming.

faqs.question: Can I use Relume for client projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, Relume’s components and tools can be used for unlimited client projects, making it ideal for freelancers and agencies.

faqs.question: What support does Relume offer?
faqs.answer: Relume provides support through its Slack community for project-related issues and email at support@relume.io for account-related inquiries.

faqs.question: How fast can I build a website with Relume?
faqs.answer: With Relume’s AI tools, users can generate sitemaps in seconds and wireframes with copy in minutes, enabling website concepts in under 5 minutes.

faqs.question: Is Relume suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, Relume Library Lite offers a free, simplified version for beginners, while the full library suits advanced Webflow developers.

faqs.question: Can I export Relume designs to Figma?
faqs.answer: Yes, Relume’s Figma plugin allows seamless export of sitemaps and wireframes to Figma, syncing with existing design styles.

faqs.question: Does Relume support React development?
faqs.answer: Yes, Relume offers a React UI Library with 1,400+ components built using Typescript, Tailwind, and Shadcn UI.
